member.name: T:Holoville.HOTween.Plugins.PlugSetColor
member.summary: Plugin for the tweening of the color of your choice. Used for changing material colors different from the default one (like _SpecColor or _Emission). Target for this tween must be of type .

member.summary: Creates a new instance of this plugin with the given options. Used because easeType can't be null, and otherwise there's no way to understand if the ease was voluntarily set by the user or not.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.Plugins.Core.ABSTweenPlugin.Init(Holoville.HOTween.Tweener,System.String,Holoville.HOTween.EaseType,System.Type,System.Reflection.PropertyInfo,System.Reflection.FieldInfo)
member.summary: Initializes the plugin after its instantiation. Called by Tweener after a property and plugin have been validated, and the plugin has to be set and added. Virtual because some classes (like PlugVector3Path) override it to avoid isRelative being TRUE.
member.param: The to refer to.
The name of the property to control.
The to use.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.Plugins.Core.ABSTweenPlugin.Startup
member.summary: Starts up the plugin, getting the actual start and change values. Called by Tweener right before starting the effective animations.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.Plugins.Core.ABSTweenPlugin.Startup(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Starts up the plugin, getting the actual start and change values. Called by Tweener right before starting the effective animations.
member.param: Set to true by , to calculate only the speed based duration and then reset any startup changes (so Startup can be called from scratch when truly starting up).

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.Plugins.Core.ABSTweenPlugin.ForceSetSpeedBasedDuration
member.summary: If speed based duration was not already set (meaning Startup has not yet been called), calculates the duration and then resets the plugin so that Startup will restart from scratch. Used by .

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.Plugins.Core.ABSTweenPlugin.ValidateTarget(System.Object)
member.summary: Overridden by plugins that need a specific type of target, to check it and validate it. Returns true if the tween target is valid.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.Plugins.Core.ABSTweenPlugin.Update(System.Single)
member.summary: Updates the tween.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.Plugins.Core.ABSTweenPlugin.DoUpdate(System.Single)
member.summary: Updates the plugin.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.Plugins.Core.ABSTweenPlugin.Complete

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.Plugins.Core.ABSTweenPlugin.SetChangeVal
member.summary: Sets the typed changeVal based on the current startVal and endVal. Can only be called once, otherwise some typedEndVal (like HOTPluginColor) will be set incorrectly.

member.name: P:Holoville.HOTween.Plugins.Core.ABSTweenPlugin.pluginId
member.summary: Some plugins might override this to specify a different ID (like PlugVector3X). Used by to check if two plugins are the same (for overwrite purposes). Plugins with -1 ids always overwrite and are overwritten. Plugins with different ids are always overwritten by plugins with -1 ids, but overwrite only identical ids.

member.name: T:Holoville.HOTween.IHOTweenComponent
member.summary: Public interface shared by and .

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.IHOTweenComponent.Kill
member.summary: Kills this Tweener/Sequence.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.IHOTweenComponent.Play
member.summary: Resumes this Tweener/Sequence (tween delay included).

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.IHOTweenComponent.PlayForward
member.summary: Resumes this Tweener/Sequence (tween delay included) and plays it forward.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.IHOTweenComponent.PlayBackwards
member.summary: Resumes this Tweener/Sequence and plays it backwards.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.IHOTweenComponent.Pause
member.summary: Pauses this Tweener/Sequence.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.IHOTweenComponent.Rewind
member.summary: Rewinds this Tweener/Sequence (loops and tween delay included), and pauses it.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.IHOTweenComponent.Restart
member.summary: Restarts this Tweener/Sequence from the beginning (loops and tween delay included).

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.IHOTweenComponent.Reverse(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Reverses this Tweener/Sequence, animating it backwards from its current position.
member.param: If TRUE, the tween will also start playing in case it was paused, otherwise it will maintain its current play/pause state (default).

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.IHOTweenComponent.Complete
member.summary: Completes this Tweener/Sequence. Where a loop was involved and not infinite, the Tweener/Sequence completes at the position where it would actually be after the set number of loops. If there were infinite loops, this method will have no effect.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.IHOTweenComponent.GoTo(System.Single)
member.summary: Sends the Tweener/Sequence to the given time (taking also loops into account). If the time is bigger than the total Tweener/Sequence duration, it goes to the end.
member.param: The time where the Tweener/Sequence should be sent.
member.returns: Returns true if the Tweener/Sequence reached its end and was completed.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.IHOTweenComponent.GoToAndPlay(System.Single)
member.summary: Sends the Tweener/Sequence to the given time (taking also loops into account) and plays it. If the time is bigger than the total Tweener/Sequence duration, it goes to the end.
member.param: The time where the Tweener/Sequence should be sent.
member.returns: Returns true if the Tweener/Sequence reached its end and was completed.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.IHOTweenComponent.IsTweening(System.Object)
member.summary: Returns true if the given target is currently involved in this Tweener/Sequence (taking into account also nested tweens). Returns false both if the given target is not inside this Tweener/Sequence, than if the relative Tweener/Sequence is paused. To simply check if the target is attached to this Tweener/Sequence, use IsLinkedTo( target ) instead.
member.param: The target to check.
member.returns: A value of true if the given target is currently involved in a running tween or sequence.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.IHOTweenComponent.IsLinkedTo(System.Object)
member.summary: Returns true if the given target is linked to this Tweener/Sequence (running or not, taking into account also nested tweens).
member.param: The target to check.
member.returns: A value of true if the given target is linked to this Tweener/Sequence (running or not, taking into account also nested tweens).

member.name: P:Holoville.HOTween.IHOTweenComponent.id
member.summary: Eventual ID of this tween (more than one tween can share the same ID, thus allowing for grouped operations). You can also use intId instead of id for faster operations.

member.name: P:Holoville.HOTween.IHOTweenComponent.intId
member.summary: Default is -1. Eventual int ID of this tween (more than one tween can share the same intId, thus allowing for grouped operations). The main difference from id is that while id is more legible, intId allows for faster operations.

member.name: P:Holoville.HOTween.IHOTweenComponent.autoKillOnComplete
member.summary: Default is true. If false doesn't remove this Tweener/Sequence from HOTween's list when it is completed (useful if you want to be able to control it independently with GoTo, instead than letting it run), and you will need to call an HOTween.Kill to remove this Tweener/Sequence.

member.name: P:Holoville.HOTween.IHOTweenComponent.enabled
member.summary: Default is true. If set to false, this Tweener/Sequence will not be updated, and any use of animation methods (Play/Pause/Rewind/etc) will be ignored (both if called directly via this instance, than if using HOTween.Play/Pause/Rewind/etc.).

member.name: P:Holoville.HOTween.IHOTweenComponent.timeScale
member.summary: Time scale that will be used by this Tweener/Sequence.

member.name: P:Holoville.HOTween.IHOTweenComponent.loops
member.summary: Number of times the Tweener/Sequence will run (-1 means the tween has infinite loops, 1 means the tween will run only once).

member.name: P:Holoville.HOTween.IHOTweenComponent.loopType
member.summary: Type of loop for this Tweener/Sequence, in case is greater than 1 (or infinite).

member.name: P:Holoville.HOTween.IHOTweenComponent.position
member.summary: Gets and sets the time position of the Tweener/Sequence (loops are included when not infinite, delay is not).

member.summary: Duration of this Tweener/Sequence, loops and tween delay excluded.

member.name: P:Holoville.HOTween.IHOTweenComponent.fullDuration
member.summary: Full duration of this Tweener/Sequence, loops included (when not infinite) but tween delay excluded.

member.name: P:Holoville.HOTween.IHOTweenComponent.elapsed
member.summary: Elapsed time within the current loop (tween delay excluded). Note that elapsed will be equal to duration only when all the loops are completed, otherwise each time a loop is completed, completedLoops is augmented by 1 and elapsed is reset to 0.

member.name: P:Holoville.HOTween.IHOTweenComponent.fullElapsed
member.summary: Full elapsed time including loops (but without considering tween delay).

member.summary: Completes this Tweener/Sequence. Where a loop was involved, the Tweener/Sequence completes at the position where it would actually be after the set number of loops. If there were infinite loops, this method will have no effect.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.Core.ABSTweenComponent.GoTo(System.Single)
member.summary: Sends the Tweener/Sequence to the given time (taking also loops into account). If the time is bigger than the total Tweener/Sequence duration, it goes to the end.
member.param: The time where the Tweener/Sequence should be sent.
member.returns: Returns true if the Tweener/Sequence reached its end and was completed.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.Core.ABSTweenComponent.GoTo(System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sends the Tweener/Sequence to the given time (taking also loops into account). If the time is bigger than the total Tweener/Sequence duration, it goes to the end.
member.param: The time where the Tweener/Sequence should be sent.

By default, if a Tweener/Sequence is already at the exact given time, it will not be refreshed. Setting this to true will force it to refresh (useful only if you want to be sure that any changes you made to the tweened property, outside of HOTween, are reset).
member.returns: Returns true if the Tweener/Sequence reached its end and was completed.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.Core.ABSTweenComponent.GoToAndPlay(System.Single)
member.summary: Sends the Tweener/Sequence to the given time (taking also loops into account) and plays it. If the time is bigger than the total Tweener/Sequence duration, it goes to the end.
member.param: The time where the Tweener/Sequence should be sent.
member.returns: Returns true if the Tweener/Sequence reached its end and was completed.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.Core.ABSTweenComponent.GoToAndPlay(System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sends the Tweener/Sequence to the given time (taking also loops into account) and plays it. If the time is bigger than the total Tweener/Sequence duration, it goes to the end.
member.param: The time where the Tweener/Sequence should be sent.

By default, if a Tweener/Sequence is already at the exact given time, it will not be refreshed. Setting this to true will force it to refresh (useful only if you want to be sure that any changes you made to the tweened property, outside of HOTween, are reset).
member.returns: Returns true if the Tweener/Sequence reached its end and was completed.

member.summary: Updates the Tweener/Sequence by the given elapsed time, and returns a value of true if the Tweener/Sequence is complete.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.Core.ABSTweenComponent.Update(System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Updates the Tweener/Sequence by the given elapsed time, and returns a value of true if the Tweener/Sequence is complete.
member.param: The elapsed time since the last update.

If true forces the update even if the Tweener/Sequence is complete or paused, but ignores onUpdate, and sends onComplete and onStepComplete calls only if the Tweener/Sequence wasn't complete before this call.
member.returns: A value of true if the tween is not reversed and complete (or the tween target doesn't exist anymore), otherwise false.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.Core.ABSTweenComponent.Update(System.Single,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Updates the Tweener/Sequence by the given elapsed time, and returns a value of true if the Tweener/Sequence is complete.
member.param: The elapsed time since the last update.

If true forces the update even if the Tweener/Sequence is complete or paused, but ignores onUpdate, and sends onComplete and onStepComplete calls only if the Tweener/Sequence wasn't complete before this call.
If true means the update is due to a startup iteration (managed by Sequence Startup), and all callbacks will be ignored.
member.returns: A value of true if the tween is not reversed and complete (or the tween target doesn't exist anymore), otherwise false.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.Core.ABSTweenComponent.Update(System.Single,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Updates the Tweener/Sequence by the given elapsed time, and returns a value of true if the Tweener/Sequence is complete.
member.param: The elapsed time since the last update.

If true forces the update even if the Tweener/Sequence is complete or paused, but ignores onUpdate, and sends onComplete and onStepComplete calls only if the Tweener/Sequence wasn't complete before this call.
If true means the update is due to a startup iteration (managed by Sequence Startup), and all callbacks will be ignored.
If true doesn't call any callback method.
member.returns: A value of true if the tween is not reversed and complete (or the tween target doesn't exist anymore), otherwise false.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.Sequence.Clear(Holoville.HOTween.SequenceParms)
member.summary: Clears this sequence and resets its parameters, so it can be re-used. You can check if a Sequence is clean by querying its isEmpty property.
member.param: New parameters for the Sequence (if NULL, note that the dafult ones will be used, and not the previous ones)

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.Sequence.Kill(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Kills this Sequence and cleans it.
member.param: If true also calls HOTween.Kill(this) to remove it from HOTween. Set internally to false when I already know that HOTween is going to remove it.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.Sequence.Rewind
member.summary: Rewinds this Sequence (loops included), and pauses it.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.Sequence.Restart
member.summary: Restarts this Sequence from the beginning (loops included).

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.Sequence.IsTweening(System.Object)
member.summary: Returns true if the given target is currently involved in a running tween of this Sequence (taking into account also nested tweens). Returns false both if the given target is not inside any of this Sequence tweens, than if the relative tween is paused. To simply check if the target is attached to a tween of this Sequence, use IsLinkedTo( target ) instead.
member.param: The target to check.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.Sequence.IsTweening(System.String)
member.summary: Returns true if the tween with the given string id is currently involved in a running tween or sequence.
member.param: The id to check for.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.Sequence.IsTweening(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns true if the tween with the given int id is currently involved in a running tween or sequence.
member.param: The id to check for.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.Sequence.IsLinkedTo(System.Object)
member.summary: Returns true if the given target is linked to a tween of this Sequence (running or not, taking into account also nested tweens).
member.param: The target to check.
member.returns: A value of true if the given target is linked to a tween of this Sequence (running or not, taking into account also nested tweens).

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.Sequence.GetTweenTargets
member.summary: Returns a list of all the targets of this Sequence, or NULL if there are none.
member.returns: A list of all the targets of this Sequence, or NULL if there are none.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.Sequence.GetTweenersByTarget(System.Object)
member.summary: Returns a list of the eventual nested objects whose target is the given one, or an empty list if none was found.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.Sequence.GetTweensById(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a list of the eventual existing tweens with the given Id within this Sequence, nested tweens included (or an empty list if no tweens were found).

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.Sequence.GetTweensByIntId(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a list of the eventual existing tweens with the given Id within this Sequence, nested tweens included (or an empty list if no tweens were found).

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.Sequence.Remove(Holoville.HOTween.Core.ABSTweenComponent)
member.summary: Removes the given tween from this Sequence, and eventually kills the Sequence if all items have been removed. Used by to remove overwritten tweens.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.Sequence.Complete(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Completes this Sequence. Where a loop was involved, the Sequence completes at the position where it would actually be after the set number of loops. If there were infinite loops, this method will have no effect.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.Sequence.Update(System.Single,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Updates the Sequence by the given elapsed time, and returns a value of true if the Sequence is complete.
member.param: The elapsed time since the last update.
If true forces the update even if the Sequence is complete or paused, but ignores onUpdate, and sends onComplete and onStepComplete calls only if the Sequence wasn't complete before this call.
If true means the update is due to a startup iteration (managed by Sequence Startup), and all callbacks will be ignored.
If true doesn't call any callback method.
member.returns: A value of true if the Sequence is not reversed and is complete (or all the Sequence tween targets don't exist anymore), otherwise false.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.Sequence.SetIncremental(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the correct values in case of Incremental loop type. Also called by Tweener.ApplySequenceIncrement (used by Sequences during Incremental loops).
member.param: The difference from the previous loop increment.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.Sequence.GoTo(System.Single,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sends the sequence to the given time (taking also loops into account) and eventually plays it. If the time is bigger than the total sequence duration, it goes to the end.
member.returns: Returns true if the sequence reached its end and was completed.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.Sequence.TweenStartupIteration
member.summary: Iterates through all the elements in order, to startup the plugins correctly. Called at OnStart and during Append/Insert/Prepend for speedBased tweens (to calculate correct duration).

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.Sequence.CheckSpeedBasedTween(Holoville.HOTween.IHOTweenComponent)
member.summary: If the given is a speedBased , forces it to calculate the correct duration.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.Sequence.Startup
member.summary: Startup this tween (might or might not call OnStart, depending if the tween is in a Sequence or not). Can be executed only once per tween.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.Sequence.FillPluginsList(System.Collections.Generic.List{Holoville.HOTween.Plugins.Core.ABSTweenPlugin})
member.summary: Fills the given list with all the plugins inside this sequence tween, while also looking for them recursively through inner sequences. Used by HOTween.GetPlugins.

member.summary: No messages will be logged.

member.summary: Only important messages will be logged (this will exclude warnings when a tween is overwritten).

member.summary: All messages will be logged.

member.summary: Normal update.

member.summary: Late update.

member.name: F:Holoville.HOTween.UpdateType.FixedUpdate
member.summary: Fixed update (useful for rigidBodies).

member.name: F:Holoville.HOTween.UpdateType.TimeScaleIndependentUpdate
member.summary: Timescale independent update. Contrary to the other types, this one is not subject to changes in Time.timeScale, thus it's the best way for tweens that happen inside GUI methods (so that even if the game is paused, the GUI will still have animated tweens).

member.summary: Rewinds this Tweener (loops and tween delay included), and pauses it.

member.summary: Rewinds this Tweener (loops included), and pauses it.
member.param: If true skips any initial delay.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.Tweener.RestartIncremental
member.summary: Restarts the tween from position 0, but takes the current target value as start value, and diffs to find the change value (as if it was a relative tween).

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.Tweener.Complete(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Completes this Tweener. Where a loop was involved, the Tweener completes at the position where it would actually be after the set number of loops. If there were infinite loops, this method will have no effect.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.Tweener.UsePartialPath(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: If this Tweener contains a tween, defines a portion of that path to use and re-adapt to (easing included), also re-adapting the duration to the correct partial, and rewinds/restarts the tween in its partial form (depending if it was paused or not).
member.param: Id of the new starting waypoint on the current path. If you want to be sure you're targeting the first point in the path, pass -1 (this is because the first waypoint of the path might be different from the first waypoint you passed, in case the target Transform was not already on the starting position, and thus needed to reach it).
Id of the new ending waypoint on the current path

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.Tweener.Update(System.Single,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Updates the Tweener by the given elapsed time, and returns a value of true if the Tweener is complete.
member.param: The elapsed time since the last update.
If true forces the update even if the Tweener is complete or paused, but ignores onUpdate, and sends onComplete and onStepComplete calls only if the Tweener wasn't complete before this call.
If true means the update is due to a startup iteration (managed by Sequence Startup or HOTween.From), and all callbacks will be ignored.
If true doesn't call any callback method.
If true uses p_shortElapsed fully ignoring the delay (useful when setting the initial FROM state).
member.returns: A value of true if the Tweener is not reversed and is complete (or the tween target doesn't exist anymore), otherwise false.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.HOTween.Reverse(System.Object,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Reverses all the tweens for the given target, animating them from their current value back to the starting one, and returns the total number of reversed Tweeners.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.HOTween.Complete(System.Object)
member.summary: Completes all the tweens for the given target, and returns the total number of completed Tweeners. Where a loop was involved and not infinite, the relative tween completes at the position where it would actually be after the set number of loops. If there were infinite loops, this method will have no effect.
member.param: The target whose tweens to complete.
member.returns: The total number of completed Tweeners.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.HOTween.Complete(System.String)
member.summary: Completes all the Tweeners/Sequences with the given ID, and returns the total number of completed Tweeners/Sequences. Where a loop was involved and not infinite, the relative Tweener/Sequence completes at the position where it would actually be after the set number of loops. If there were infinite loops, this method will have no effect.
member.param: The ID of the Tweeners/Sequences to complete.
member.returns: The total number of completed Tweeners/Sequences.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.HOTween.Complete(System.Int32)
member.summary: Completes all the Tweeners/Sequences with the given intId, and returns the total number of completed Tweeners/Sequences. Where a loop was involved and not infinite, the relative Tweener/Sequence completes at the position where it would actually be after the set number of loops. If there were infinite loops, this method will have no effect.
member.param: The intId of the Tweeners/Sequences to complete.
member.returns: The total number of completed Tweeners/Sequences.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.HOTween.Complete(Holoville.HOTween.Tweener)
member.summary: Completes the given Tweener, and returns the total number of completed ones (1 if the Tweener existed, otherwise 0). Where a loop was involved and not infinite, the relative Tweener completes at the position where it would actually be after the set number of loops. If there were infinite loops, this method will have no effect.
member.param: The Tweener to complete.
member.returns: The total number of completed Tweeners (1 if the Tweener existed, otherwise 0).

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.HOTween.Complete(Holoville.HOTween.Sequence)
member.summary: Completes the given Sequence, and returns the total number of completed ones (1 if the Sequence existed, otherwise 0). Where a loop was involved and not infinite, the relative Sequence completes at the position where it would actually be after the set number of loops. If there were infinite loops, this method will have no effect.
member.param: The Sequence to complete.
member.returns: The total number of completed Sequences (1 if the Sequence existed, otherwise 0).

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.HOTween.Complete
member.summary: Completes all Tweeners/Sequences, and returns the total number of completed Tweeners/Sequences. Where a loop was involved and not infinite, the relative Tweener/Sequence completes at the position where it would actually be after the set number of loops. If there were infinite loops, this method will have no effect.
member.returns: The total number of completed Tweeners/Sequences.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.TweenParms.SpeedBased
member.summary: Sets this tween to work by speed instead than time. When a tween is based on speed instead than time, duration is considered as the amount that the property will change every second, and ease is automatically set to Linear. In case of Vectors, the amount represents the vector length x second; in case of Quaternions, the amount represents the full rotation (360) speed x second; in case of strings, the amount represents the amount of changed letters x second.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.TweenParms.SpeedBased(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets whether to tween by speed or not. When a tween is based on speed instead than time, duration is considered as the amount that the property will change every second, and ease is automatically set to Linear. In case of Vectors, the amount represents the vector length x second; in case of strings, the amount represents the amount of changed letters x second.
member.param: If true this tween will work by speed instead than by time.

member.summary: Like , but also inverts the easing (meaning if it was easeInSomething, it will become easeOutSomething, and viceversa).

member.name: F:Holoville.HOTween.LoopType.Incremental
member.summary: Continuously increments the tween (X to Y, Y to Y+(Y-X), and so on), thus always moving "onward".

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.Core.Easing.Back.EaseIn(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Easing equation function for a back (overshooting cubic easing: (s+1)*t^3 - s*t^2) easing in: accelerating from zero velocity.
member.param: Current time (in frames or seconds).
Starting value.
Change needed in value.
Expected easing duration (in frames or seconds).
Overshoot ammount: higher means greater overshoot (0 produces cubic easing with no overshoot, and the default value of 1.70158 produces an overshoot of 10 percent).
Unused: here to keep same delegate for all ease types.
member.returns: The eased value.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.Core.Easing.Back.EaseOut(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Easing equation function for a back (overshooting cubic easing: (s+1)*t^3 - s*t^2) easing out: decelerating from zero velocity.
member.param: Current time (in frames or seconds).
Starting value.
Change needed in value.
Expected easing duration (in frames or seconds).
Overshoot ammount: higher means greater overshoot (0 produces cubic easing with no overshoot, and the default value of 1.70158 produces an overshoot of 10 percent).
Unused: here to keep same delegate for all ease types.
member.returns: The eased value.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.Core.Easing.Back.EaseInOut(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Easing equation function for a back (overshooting cubic easing: (s+1)*t^3 - s*t^2) easing in/out: acceleration until halfway, then deceleration.
member.param: Current time (in frames or seconds).
Starting value.
Change needed in value.
Expected easing duration (in frames or seconds).
Overshoot ammount: higher means greater overshoot (0 produces cubic easing with no overshoot, and the default value of 1.70158 produces an overshoot of 10 percent).
Unused: here to keep same delegate for all ease types.
member.returns: The eased value.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.Plugins.PlugQuaternion.Beyond360
member.summary: Parameter > Sets rotations to be calculated fully, and the end value will be reached using the full degrees of the given rotation, even if beyond 360 degrees.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.Plugins.PlugQuaternion.Beyond360(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Parameter > Choose whether you want to calculate angles bigger than 360 degrees or not. In the first case, the end value will be reached using the full degrees of the given rotation. In the second case, the end value will be reached from the shortest direction. If the endValue is set as relative, this option will have no effect, and full beyond 360 rotations will always be used.
member.param: Set to true to use angles bigger than 360 degrees.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.SequenceParms.Id(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the ID of this Sequence (default = ""). The same ID can be applied to multiple Sequences, thus allowing for group operations. You can also use IntId instead of Id for faster operations.
member.param: The ID for this Sequence.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.SequenceParms.IntId(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the int ID of this Tweener (default = 0). The same intId can be applied to multiple Tweeners, thus allowing for group operations. The main difference from Id is that while Id is more legible, IntId allows for faster operations.
member.param: The int ID for this Tweener.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.SequenceParms.AutoKill(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets auto-kill behaviour for when the Sequence reaches its end (default = false).
member.param: If true the Sequence is killed and removed from HOTween as soon as it's completed. If false doesn't remove this Sequence from HOTween when it is completed, and you will need to call an HOTween.Kill to remove this Sequence.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.SequenceParms.UpdateType(Holoville.HOTween.UpdateType)
member.summary: Sets the type of update to use for this Sequence (default = .Update).
member.param: The type of update to use.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.SequenceParms.TimeScale(System.Single)
member.summary: Sets the time scale that will be used by this Sequence.
member.param: The time scale to use.

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.SequenceParms.Loops(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the number of times the Sequence will run (default = 1, meaning only one go and no other loops).
member.param: Number of loops (set it to -1 or to apply infinite loops).

member.name: M:Holoville.HOTween.SequenceParms.Loops(System.Int32,Holoville.HOTween.LoopType)
member.summary: Sets the number of times the Sequence will run, and the type of loop behaviour to apply (default = 1, LoopType.Restart).
member.param: Number of loops (set it to -1 or to apply infinite loops).
The behaviour to use. Note the is available, but as an experimental feature. It works with simple Sequences, but you should check that your animation works as intended with more complex Sequences.
